name: Code Clicker
description:
Code Clicker, a basic clicker game where you mine as many bitcoins as possible. You can buy upgrades from the shop to increase your bitcoin count. Go and see how many bitcoins you can get!

Project made for portfolio purposes.

Made with: Unity 3D

Credits:

Game made by: Carlos Eduardo Pérez Villanueva

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY Icons made by Good Ware from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 B

Most images found on Google

Donations:
Buy me a cup of coffee if your heart says so. Donations are allowed but not required. Enjoy the game <3
